short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Update all elements that begin with Hebrew letters to RTL and align them to the right. Very useful for Hebrew speakers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are a Hebrew speaker that needs to do some work online and frustrated about the alignment of elements and text on websites this is the extension to go for you.

This extension will automatically scroll through websites that you approved and look for elements which have Hebrew text at their beginning and will align then to the right and make them RTL.
